text:
Bhai Aero department tum jaise kuch bhale manush  ki wajah se chal rha tha ğŸ™
Apan sabse pehle to aeromodelling club me hi mile the , kya dedication ke saath kaam krta tha bhai tu , woh cheez to bahut kaam aayi aage jaake in fabrication lab (kamle waali), bc maine apni almost saari hot-wire cutting tujhse yaa pence se hi karwai thi ğŸ˜‚.
Aur hn thanks to all those assignment solutions at the end moment, bhai aero core me jaata to india ki defence industry ko bahut faeda milta lekin chill hai ab icici me jaake paisa banao ğŸ˜›.
All the best for future bro ğŸ‘.

text:
Chandra bhai , i initially thought you were a condescending pompous smug (lolol L17(?) waali english ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚), lekin bhai woh manali waali trip pe jab tum us cab driver se bhid gaye jo mock kar rha tha people of UP and Bihar to mujhe laga nhi bhai ye banda to kaafi sahi aur sensitive hai. 

Bhai mere room pe wo late night politics discussion to hamesha yaad rahegi , kya mast chal rhi thi wo, tumhare kanpur tinder date ka story jahan tumne saare bases pehli date m hi....ğŸ˜ğŸ˜.  Baaki to jatin kuch kuch batata hi rehta tha tum sabke baare me.
Apan to ek hi shehr me rehte hai to milna julna to laga rahega, baaki tum jldi se ye degree khatm karo, job pakdo aur treat do achhi wali. All the best bro.
P.S - tumhari us dost ka abhi tk phone nhi aaya jisko advise chaiye thi ğŸ˜ğŸ˜.
author: Harshit  Rao

text:

Me : assignment, submit krne ke lie
A : Kl quiz hai AE618 ki.ğŸ˜‚
Me : ğŸ˜¶
Sums it up.
Apan ki almost saari baat watsapp, messenger pe hi hui hogi. Assignment sharing se lekar , classes me tujhse attendance jldi pass krwane tk, and towards the end cursing ourselves for taking AE618, department ke kaafi course saath kie hai.

text:
"Bhai kuch kaam to kar nhi rahe lekin tension hamesha rehti hai" - Us during summers. 
Bhai khoob pel ke bkchodi kaati hai apan ne summers aur antaragni waale sem me, fatt bhi rkhi thi lekin mazaa bhi aata tha.
Mujhe ek incident jo hamesha yaad aata hai wo jab apan theme ke lie FB post daal rhe the and in the end 2 ghante sochne ke baad bc pichle saal waala post hi copy kar dia tha LOL, Ekdm deadline based kaam krte the apan ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.
Teri to bahut li hai maine, tujhe bc PUTA ka mtlb bhi galat pata tha maine sahi kia wo baad me. 'You-know-who'  aur teri jodi ko bhi bahut troll kia hai apan ne , mazaa aata tha wo krke aur bhai kya blush maarta tha tu phir. Lekin jab tune bazooka me story batai to laga ki achha nhi hua tere saath. ğŸ˜›
Bhai tu kaafi dedicated ho ke kaam kia ritambhara me lekin mujhse kam XDDD. Tera perf waala sweater ka yaad krke bahut hasi aati hai abhi tk. Waise Ritika ne accha kia ki Treat dilwa di wrna bc bachhe abhi tk gaalian de rhe hote lol.
Intern ke time bhai tera thoda late se hua lekin pehle interview me hi phod dia ek dm aur Placement me to machaya hi hai. All the best bro, ab raees ho rahe ho to paise kharch krna seekho ğŸ˜, aur trip to apan ki pending hai hi jo ki pkka se karenge ek baar.
P.S - I'm a century ahead of you ( roll no. wise) ğŸ˜‚
author: Harshit  Rao

Chalo bhai , all the best , meet you soon.

text:
Bhai kitne maje aate the jab apan do aspirant saath baith kr aspirant dekhte the aur galtiyaan nikalte the show me. Bhai tune SoS ko nayi uchaaiyan di hai jiske lie i am very proudğŸ™. Bhai apan kitni common jagaho pe the be it quiz club , aeromodelling, SoS , Ritambhara. Achha hua ki hall12 me same wing mil gayi aur jaan gaye apan ek doosre ko.
Aur bhai lassod-pana thoda km karo bandi hone ke baad bhi Ritambhara me muh maarte rehte the.ğŸ˜
Bhai Ias banoğŸ¤, desh ko sambhalo aur power, stability, recognition ki jo bhookh hai usse pura karo. Ek cheez dhyaan rkhna ki bhale hi Kitni bhi vanshikas pta lo lekin rajinder nagar ke relationshp Rajinder Nagar tk hi reh jaate hai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.

text:
Bagle bhai tujhse jyada aaram iitk  me aane k baad kisi ne nhi kia hoga. First year me SnT code me tujhse mila tha , tb to tu bc poora show-off laga mujhe lekin baad me pata chala ki nhi banda kaafi grounded hai.
First year me poora interaction to Axel blaze se hi hua tha , bagla to pata bhi nhi tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, phir 2nd year me group ban gaya and rest is history. Teri to bhaii bahut yaadein hai , exam waali raat CS go khel ke so jaata tha aur bc subah phir room pe aake mujhe jagata tha ki bhai notes dede xD. Tu fraudi to kaafi tha lekin end moment pe kaam karke sambhaal leta tha projects ko, hamare group ka technical banda tha tu.
Tera bhai ghar se alag connection tha bc , 3-4 din ki chutti me bhi itni door wapas chala jaata tha, phir bhi tera frosty ke saath breakup ho gaya ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Bhai tu ek accha insaan hai , kahi bhi jaega , you will be an asset , bas sort kr le mind me ki krna kya hai , baaki sab to chill hai.
THik hai bhai hamara assignment aur courses ka saath yahi tk tha , aage milte rahenge pkka se, aur poora MA.KU.NA.HA  saath me ek trip bhi maarega, ok bro All the best.
author: Harshit  Rao

text:
KG bhai !!
Yaar apan ki jyada baatein to hui nahi lekin bas wo Mess me kabhi , kabhi canteen me aise hi backchodiaan kaat lia krte the. Baaki yaar jb doosre teri lete the tab dekh ke bahut hasi aati thi , lekin tune kabhi glt way me nhi lia usse , chill tha tu sabke saath.
Teri kaafi kahania sunai hai shibalik aur soni ne ki kaise unhone bc teri cycle buy and sell pe daal di thi xD. 
ALL the best bro for life ahead and stay in touch.
author: Harshit  Rao

text:
Yaar log assignments divide krke karte hai , hum logo ne to course hi divide kr lie ki tu aur bagle ye dekhlo mai aur naman doosra dekh lenge lol, long live MA.KU.NA.HA. Bhagwaan ka shukra hai ki hamara group ban gaya aur department ki pareshaania kaafi kam ho gyi.
Sabse pehle mytree tere baare me to pandit se hi suna tha , phir tu campaigning krne aai thi shayd aur phir campus ki har wo cheez se tu assosciated this jisse mai koso door rehta tha. Shayd Hindi Sahitya Sabha hi ek common cheez thi lekin usme bhi hum hamesha jeete the aur GH to well.. ğŸ˜›. Thanks for taking my sexist jokes in good humour(which they were meant to be ) and being so frank and open.  Ek to mai aaj tk confuse rehta hu ki tu benares ki hai yaa allahabad ( oops prayagraj , sorry yogiji). 
Navroz sir ke BOOMI se le kar cs upadhyay ke beams tk , apan ne anginat projects saath kie hai. Ek cheez jispe mujhe hamesha hasi aati hai ki same assgn krne ke baad bhi tere hamesha sabse kam number aate the hum chaaro me ğŸ˜‚. Aur wo OAT me late night movies , jisme hum pehle 1hr me hi bore ho jaate the ğŸ˜”. Mujhe lagta hai i'm way more comfortable talking to you on whatsapp than in person ig due to our constant bickering over  'you-know-which' emoji ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Maine aur naman ne tujhe aur bagle ko set krne ki bahut koshish ki ğŸ˜›jo ki nahi ho paaya. 
Dekhte hai aage kb mulaakat hoti hai , tb tk ke lie all the best aur jaate jaate tujhe ek naya nickname de dia - MI3 and hn you owe your degree to me ğŸ˜.
author: Harshit  Rao

text:
Aero ke saare log ek taraf aur pence ek taraf. Bhai tujhse jyada helpful banda koi nhi tha aero department me aur club me. Tujhe raat me kabhi bhi message kr do , kuch bhi maang lo you never hesitated. Bahut Chaapu hai bhai tu. Mera group especially mai aur naman ğŸ˜› to Teri bahut respect krte the.
Placement me to ek dm phod dia tumne ek dm bakchod level, lekin amrendra waali cheez tujhe bhi kahunga ki core me jaata to indian aerospace ka bahut faeda hota ğŸ˜. 
Jaao bhai sprinklr me bhi machao , touch me rahenge, milte rahenge, ab to gurgaon me aa rha tu (apna ilaka hai ğŸ˜). ALL the best bro, chaapte raho
author: Harshit  Rao

text: Bhai high karwane ke lie aur mast trip dilwane ke lie shukriya, tera laptop kharaab krne ke lie maafi. Ek accha insaan , achha dost hai tu. Jis field me tu jaana chahta hai udhar jaa aur mast chaap as always.

text:
Bhai sam daam dand bhed ,tu kuch na kuch karke kaam nikaal hi leta tha , tujhse jyada daring insaan nhi dekha bhai maine IITK me , kisi bhi baat pe kisi se bhi bkchodi kaat lena be it sis guard or navroz ( jahan tune apne bhai ko hi .....ğŸ˜).  Teri kewal ek jagah fatt ti thi wo tha exam se pehle aur exam hall me.

Bhai bahut maze aate the apan dono jab saath me lecture hall se jldi se bhaagte the, assignments saath milkar copy krna, mi3 aur bagle ki lena, bhai aero department nhi jhel paata mai agar tu nhi hota. Bhai negotiating skills to bahut bdhiaan hai teri , auto waale se lekar , restaraunt owner tk sabse behas kr leta tha tu ğŸ˜‚. 
Baaki upar se to tu bahut tough lgta hai to strangers lekin hame pata hai ki andar se tu apan bhaiyon me yash kumar ke baad sbse jyada teri hi fatt ti thi, be it placements , intern or grades ğŸ˜, lekin chill hai uss jagah hona bhi chaiye.

Chal bhai apan ka academic safar to yahi tk tha , aage pandit se eco dept ke tips lete rahio ğŸ˜‚, placement me chill maar bahut achha hoga tera mehnat krte reh bas.
Abhi to bahut bakchodia aur kaatni hai, long live our friendship, long live jaina mohan caterers.â¤â¤
author: Harshit  Rao

text:
I would like to thank Counselling servie jisne tujhe reject kia aur tu Ritambhara me aa gyi ğŸ˜›(ye line aayush me bhi jaegi). yaar kya mast team thi apan teeno ki + krishna, kitne maze kie apan ne wo time to bahut yaad aaega mujhe. Kitni treats kari  hamne after antaragni aur kitni hi treats baaki hai abhi. You were always so sweet  , meri gaalio pe bhi hasne lgti thiğŸ˜‚. 
You were one of the most sensitive person i met in campus, mai to kuch bhi bol deta tha jo muh me aaya ğŸ˜islie barracks waali treat pe jo hua uske lie maafi ğŸ™ğŸ˜‚. Jenga sikhane ke lie thank you. Jaldi se apna degree khatm karo aur phir saari treats aur trips pe chalenge.Aise hi haste muskuraate raho, All the best and Ritambhara Rocks !!

text:
Pandit bhai u were always a source of entertainment for the group, right from the start , kbhi mytree , kbhi nishta jain , kbhi kuch aur , hmesha koi na koi kissa hota hi tha tere se related. Aur bhai u have the unique distinction of being the first in the group jiski bandi ho to bahut badhaiyan ğŸ˜.
Pandit yaar tere room me aake lagta tha ki organised way me kaise rehte hai , dekh ke inspiration milti thi lekin apne room tk jaate jaate sab gayab ho jaati thi aur phir tujhe mere room ka one hand rule to maalum hi tha, dustbin se lekar , extension tk sab ek haath ki doori pe. Baaki tu to kamre pe rehta kam hi tha , to phir mai tere bed pe hi fael ke dayal ke saath pubg khelta rehta tha. Bhai HSS me tu tha islie accha bhi lagta tha, shayd usi se first year me apni bonding achhi ho gyi thi, har din raat me 9-4 bc pel ke HSS ki practice karo aur phir baad me Gupchup khelo, bhai usme bhi avinash ki lene me bahut mazaa aata tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.
Apan dono ka hi plan tha 2nd year me ki foreign research intern me chalenge, tune to surge ka form bhar dia tha as a step toward this aur mai bc form bharna hi bhool gaya, pubg khelta raha ğŸ˜›. Tujhe bhai mil bhi gyi foreign intern lekin ab chill hai corona hai hi itna chutiap bc. Baaki jahan abhi intern pe jaa rahe ho wahan chaapna mast ekdm.
Bhai tere li bhi kitni hai maine , be it tera breakfast me pel ke dosa dabana yaa mess me bday treat pe pastry khilana ğŸ˜‚, mazaa aata tha bhai, apan ki ek trip to ho gyi abhi kuch aur baaki hai wo to pakka karenge.
Jldi se bhai apni degree khatm kar , mote ki help kar dio economics me , job pakad aur phir apan saare bhai mast trip pe chalenge. ALL the best bhai, aise hi acche insaan aur dost bane raho.
author: Harshit  Rao

text:
bhai ekdm end me likh rha hu , kewal ek line likhunga :
Tumse jyada gyaan mahapurush koi nhi hai iitk me. Tumhari awaaz me jo dam hai usse mudiji bhi jalte honge. HSS me tumhara coincidentally aana was the best thing happened to Hall3 that year and also to Hindi Sahitya sabha

text:
Sherkhan bhai ka mini militia me naam chalta tha (dayal ke peeche ğŸ˜‚).
Bhai tu shayd pehla aur last bnda tha iitk me jiske saath haatha-payi tk baat pahunch gyi thi ğŸ˜ğŸ˜, ab to yaad bhi nhi hai kislie. First year ti bhai humne tera kaafi rr suna hai kaise tu IIT-B ko dump krke kanpur aa gya. Bhai tu trip ya treats pe rehta tha to fun aur bkchodi badh jaaati thi , mostly coz naman teri khoob leta tha, harami hai bsdka wo to ğŸ˜‚ aur bhai kahi chalne ke lie koi ready ho na ho tu hamesha hota tha.

Samyk jain aur tu dono daitya bhai - ataapi aur watapi ki tarah the xDD, ab jain sahb ne to khoob chaap dia , tu bhi is saal placement me faad de, phir apan sab bdhiaan goa wagera chalenge trip pe sab bhailog. All the best bhai , keep smiling.
author: Harshit  Rao

text:
chuddo saali randi maadarchod, bhn ki lodi, kutia; bhai this is how I mostly called you all our college life but Bhai let me tell you I shared the most unique bond in IITK with you. I harassed you, abused you, cursed you, have beaten you, stolen your food but bhai I also profoundly cared about you, I knew when you were tensed be it with intern or assignment submission or midsem/endsem but ig the photos captured by Naman just shows the former part ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›. 
Bhai I had the most enjoying conversations/fight ğŸ˜ with you on such wide-ranging topics, one incident i remember is that we debated continuously for one complete hour and in the end had to stop because our throat dried up and we got thirsty ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Baaki to bhai we all know how berserk you used to go whenever some item of yours went missing ( except those headphones where u were totally calm ğŸ˜’ğŸ˜’). Also bhai thank you for being my constant companion in quizzing where sometimes we used to have total bloodbath and sometimes scored pretty high.
Placement times shows everyone who their real friends are and I can't thank you enough for all the help, you used to be there on zoom call for the whole time. I have sent you tons of questions from hacker rank and you used to try your best to help me understand them and find the solution to them. I even gave CAT because of you and u mofo chickened out in the end ğŸ”.
Your room were always next to mine and most of the time It was me who was in your bed, using your laptop to watch web series ( Oh I even forgot how many of those we have watched together). It was so fortunate that my interview was in Delhi and I was able to meet to you , that was a unique experience in its own right , exploring Old delhi, getting life lesson of not trusting food vloggers , going round and round in CP and those long talks on Rajpath and realising how single we are ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£.
Bro I feel that you have always thought that we were not  very good bhais from your level of competency and ambitiousness but bhai we have always thought about your best, u were kind of little brother to us.
Okk bro i think  I should leave now , I'm brimming with nostalgia. Now you have shifted to delhi so obvio we'll meet frequently and have fun as always.
All the best bro , may both of our careers eventually converge as civil servants ğŸ˜ğŸ˜.

And regarding the baseless question of me forgetting you, bro even if I alzheimers , your memory will clearly be remembered.
author: Harshit  Rao
